title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the cyclical rate of unemployment in Flowerland is 2%.
The response states that the cyclical rate of unemployment in Flowerland is 2%.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.
The response does not accurately include one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must show appropriate work in order to receive the point.
descriptions:
The response does not calculate the price index for 2020 as 130 and/or does not show the work.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the standard of living of the average citizen of Flowerland will decrease and/or does not explain that the increase in nominal income (20%) is less than the inflation rate (30%).
The response states that the standard of living of the average citizen of Flowerland will decrease and explains that the increase in nominal income (20%) is less than the inflation rate (30%).
